titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Northwestern Wildcats Women's Lacrosse Team on winning the 2012 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Women's Lacrosse Championship.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/29/2012--Introduced. Congratulates the Northwestern Wildcats Women's Lacrosse Team on winning the 2012 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I Women's Lacrosse Championship and on winning their seventh title in the last eight years.
